com.brightcove.onceux

Class SeekManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.event.AbstractComponent
      • com.brightcove.onceux.AbstractOnceUxManager
        • com.brightcove.onceux.SeekManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class SeekManager
extends AbstractOnceUxManager
    Provide a class to manage the media player's playhead position during seeking as the frame of reference switches between ads and content within the dynamic stitched video. Diagrammatically we have: |<(0)---------------- absolute frame of reference ----------------(L)>| |---------------------------------------------------------------------| |<-- Segment-0 -->|...|<---- Segment-i ---->|...|<---- Segment-N ---->| where Segment-i represents the i'th segment, either ad or content. This class will map a given segment index and relative position to an absolute position (from 0 to L-1, where L is the length of the dynamic stitched video). It does so by maintaining a data structure (SparseArray) that associates a segment index, the start absolute playhead position for that segment and a segment desriptor, a POJO that describes the segment.
